name: @molt/mascot-plugin
description: Clawdbot plugin for Molt Mascot (pixel lobster)

alignment.description: Screen alignment for the mascot window

clickThrough.description: Enable click-through mode (ghost mode) so the mascot doesn't intercept mouse clicks

hideText.description: Hide the text status pill (pixel-only mode)

idleDelayMs.description: Milliseconds to wait before reverting to idle state

errorHoldMs.description: Milliseconds to hold the error state before clearing
